metadata.description: Atlassian MCP server for Jira and Confluence integration

tools.name: getIssue
tools.description: Fetch details for a specific Jira issue by key (e.g., PROJ-123)

tools.name: createIssue
tools.description: Create a new Jira issue with summary, description, type, and priority

tools.name: updateIssue
tools.description: Update an existing Jira issue's fields (status, assignee, description, etc.)

tools.name: searchIssues
tools.description: Search for Jira issues using JQL (Jira Query Language)

tools.name: addComment
tools.description: Add a comment to a Jira issue

tools.name: transitionIssue
tools.description: Transition a Jira issue to a different status (e.g., In Progress, Done)

tools.name: getConfluencePage
tools.description: Retrieve content from a Confluence page by ID or title

tools.name: searchConfluence
tools.description: Search Confluence for pages and content
